backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining data types (Client, Appointment, FinancialRecord, Reminder) and CRUD operations for clients, appointments, and financial records, plus a `generateReminders` function. Uses stable Maps for persistent storage with auto-incrementing IDs.
backend/migration.mo: Minimal migration module with a no-op `run` function that passes an empty state through, used for schema migration hooks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (Reminders page, Agenda insights, CRM insights, Financial insights) to their source files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document providing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, describing their roles and recent changes across pages, components, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom properties for the design system's color tokens in both light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React SPA titled 'AgendaPro Local AI', mounting the app at `#root` and loading `main.tsx` as a module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router setup defining all application routes (dashboard, agenda, clients, financials, retention, reminders) wrapped in `AppLayout`, with a root redirect from `/` to `/dashboard`.
frontend/src/components/AgendaInsightsPa: Client-side component that computes and displays today's agenda insights including sorted appointments, free time slots (≥30 min gaps), scheduling conflicts, and actionable idle-slot promotion suggestions.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Persistent sidebar shell layout component with responsive desktop/mobile navigation, including links to all pages (Dashboard, Agenda, Clientes, Financeiro, Retenção, Lembretes).
frontend/src/components/AppointmentCalen: A weekly/daily calendar component that displays appointments in time slots (7am–7pm), supports navigation, and allows creating, updating status, and deleting appointments via dropdown menus.
frontend/src/components/AppointmentFormD: A modal dialog form for creating new appointments, with fields for client selection, service, date/time, duration, and notes, including validation and submission via a React Query mutation.
frontend/src/components/AtRiskClientsLis: Displays a list of at-risk clients (those who haven't visited recently), color-coded by risk level, with a button to generate a re-engagement message for each.
frontend/src/components/ClientDetailPane: A side panel showing detailed info for a selected client, including contact details, visit stats, appointment history, and actions to edit, delete, or generate a message.
frontend/src/components/ClientFormDialog: A modal dialog form for creating or editing a client, with fields for name, phone, email, business type, and notes, supporting both create and update mutations with validation.
frontend/src/components/ClientList.tsx: Renders a scrollable list of clients showing name, phone, business type badge, visit count, and last visit date, with selection highlighting and a click handler.
frontend/src/components/CrmInsightsPanel: Displays CRM insight cards showing inactive clients (>30 days), most frequent clients, and VIP clients by average ticket, all derived from clients and financial records props.
frontend/src/components/FinancialFormDia: Modal dialog form for creating a new financial record (income or expense) with fields for type, amount, category, date, and description, using the useCreateFinancialRecord mutation.
frontend/src/components/FinancialInsight: Renders a card with financial insights including total revenue, average ticket, and top income categories by volume, derived from the provided financial records.
frontend/src/components/FinancialSummary: Shows a three-card summary of the current month's total income, total expenses, and net balance calculated from the provided financial records.
frontend/src/components/MessageTemplateD: Dialog that displays AI-generated message templates for a client, allowing the user to copy any template to the clipboard with a visual confirmation.
frontend/src/components/TopClientsList.t: Renders a ranked list of top clients by visit count with trophy/medal icons and a button to trigger message generation for each client.
Renders a filterable, sortable table of financial records (income/expense) with delete confirmation dialogs using an alert dialog component.
frontend/src/components/WeeklyRevenueCha: Displays a bar chart of weekly income totals for the current month, aggregating financial records by week using Recharts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider, managing AuthClient lifecycle, login/logout, and persisted identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on clients, appointments, financial records, and reminders against the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining Tailwind base/component/utility layers, OKLCH CSS custom properties for light/dark themes, and custom utility classes for sidebar and status badges.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility functions for class merging, date/time formatting in pt-BR locale, nanosecond/millisecond conversions, and label/class lookups for appointment statuses and business types.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AgendaPage.tsx: Renders the Agenda page with a calendar view of appointments and an insights panel, supporting creating new appointments via a form dialog.
frontend/src/pages/ClientsPage.tsx: Renders the Clients page with a searchable client list, detail panel, CRM insights, and dialogs for creating/editing clients and generating message templates.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the main Dashboard with summary stat cards (clients, appointments, revenue, balance) and a list of upcoming appointments fetched from backend queries.
frontend/src/pages/FinancialsPage.tsx: Renders the Financials page showing summary cards, AI insights, a weekly revenue chart, and a transaction list, with a dialog to add new financial records.
frontend/src/pages/RemindersPage.tsx: Renders the Reminders page displaying auto-generated appointment reminder messages grouped by 24h and 2h intervals, with copy-to-clipboard functionality.
frontend/src/pages/RetentionPage.tsx: Renders the Client Retention page showing at-risk clients (no visit in 30+ days) and top clients by visits, with AI message template generation per client.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the AgendaPro frontend, extending the default theme with custom fonts (Inter, Plus Jakarta Sans), OKLCH-based color tokens (primary, sidebar, amber, charcoal, chart colors), border radii, box shadows, and keyframe animations. Enables dark mode via class, and includes the typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the overall AgendaPro Local AI project state (version 5), including architectural rules for structured JSON module outputs, known issues, and a registry of existing frontend features (scheduling, CRM, financial, retention, theming) with their requirement IDs and versions.
